StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetBilletByOrgAndRole]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID as integer, @Recrui.ngRoleID as varchar(2) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT RECRUITING_ROLE.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID FROM RECRUITING_ROLE, ORGANIZATION_BILLET, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION, ORGANIZATION_TYPE WHERE RECRUITING_ROLE.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = @Recrui.ngRoleID AND RECRUITING_ROLE.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = ORGANIZATION_BILLET.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID AND ORGANIZATION_BILLET.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = ORGANIZATION_TYPE.ORGANIZATION_TYPE AND ORGANIZATION_TYPE.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_TYPE AND RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID
SET NOCOUNT OFF
